content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -25.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position (-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Copper cable factory at position (-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine (exact position not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect pipes between entities. Check surrounding entities and terrain to confirm a clear path for connection.

### Errors when adding fuel to boiler
- Verify that there is a nearby entity that can accept coal before attempting to add fuel to the boiler. Ensure the boiler is properly connected to a fuel source.

### Errors retrieving entities
- Confirm that the specified position actually contains the entity type you are trying to retrieve. Double-check the coordinates and ensure the entity has not been removed or misplaced.
